div.p: This application is designed to provide Splunk integration for Airlock's enterprise Application Whitelisting solution; and
Provide easy to use dashboards that allow interrogation of common Windows Security and SysInternals SysMon events. These dashboards are focused primarily at enterprise security operations teams.
For Windows events to be displayed correctly you must have the Splunk Add-on for Microsoft Windows installed and parsing logs.
It is preferable that logs are collected from all endpoints including domain controllers to provide complete visibility and dashboard information.
For SysMon events to be displayed correctly you must have the Add-on for Microsoft SysMon installed and parsing logs.
Note: SysMon logs must be stored in the wineventlog index
Please see the readme for additional configuration information.
Airlock Digital develops industry leading application whitelisting software which makes easy, achievable and secure application whitelisting a reality.
If you already use an application whitelisting product, test its configuration with our free Application Whitelist Auditor
For more information please see our website.
